review: I bought this when it was on sale for $19, and got it to use in my bedroom to stream mainly plex and some watchespn.  the interface is great, but it stutters and buffers a ton (it will stop playback for about 15 seconds every couple of minutes) when streaming plex over a local network.  I will go back to my chromecast, 0 buffering issues with it.
